title.bibl: Correspondence of Mr. P. S. Lambros, 130 N. Wells St., Chicago.Ill. Sept. 15, 1933. R. Consolato Generale D'italia, 201 North Wells St., Suite 1614, Chicago,Ill.

div.bibl: Correspondence of Mr. P. S. Lambros, 130 N. Wells St., Chicago.Ill. Sept. 15, 1933. R. Consolato Generale D'Italia, 201 North Wells St., Suite 1614, Chicago,Ill.

body.p: The Royal Italian Ministries for Foreign Affairs and for the Royal House in Rome, Italy, have requested me to convey to you the sincere thanks of His Majesty the King of Italy and of His Excellency Premier Mussolini for the copies of the Greek Star sent by you containing articles on the transatlantic fliers of Italy.
